resources.string: RR tools will now restart. Would you like to continue?
Everything about the Resurrection Remix OS
Show your support to Resurrection Remix OS
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Use same icon style as above in QS battery tile
Custom charging symbol for text style
Custom charging symbol near battery percentage text
Show charging animation on ambient display
Toggle to view the charging animation on lockscreen ambient display. This setting does not apply for charging states.
Show battery percent on the bottom while dozing
Always display battery percentage when charging
Take fullscreen screenshot via volume keys
Drag selection on the area for screenshot via volume keys
Disable long screenshot on non partial screenshot
System is currently allowing user to generate long screenshot
System is currently allowing user to generate default screenshot
Adjust brightness from the Quick Settings
Show toggle for adaptive brightness near the slider
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
Hide VoLTE when VoWiFi is available. This also overrides old style signal icon for VoWiFi.
Looks like you have system navigation gestures enabled. These might conflict with gesture anwywhere , be careful.
Could not load %s. Make sure you have storage available.
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
Get more information about Resurrection Remix OS
Be a member of Resurrection forum
Official substratum theme of Resurrection Remix OS

● CO-Founder 
● Head developer 
● UX designer 
● Maintainer
List of devices and their official RR-OS maintainers
Make a pull request on Settings app with your name against your device if you want to apply to be a maintainer for a certain device
Let people know you use Resurrection Remix OS
Reset all configurations to default values?
WARNING! This setting will change all your options to default settings and it may take some time. You may run into issues and you may not like some defaults. Are you really sure you want to continue?
Tap here to reset accent color to default
You are about to reset accent color. Continue?
Tap here to reset theme to default
You are about to reset to default theme. Continue?
Tap to make gradient and accent colors same for those who prefer not to use gradient colors
These will override all other enabled dark /light themes from styles & wallpapers. Ensure to set system gradient color to make all brighness slider style & switch style options visible.
Enable/disable to show/hide floating button in RR tools. Enter/exit once when switch used
Tint active slider color alpha(excludes app row tint)
Tint inactive slider to same color as active slider in extended volume panel(excludes app row tint)
Customise various elements of the statusbar clock
Enable or disable custom logo in statusbar. Customise color and position
Enable or disable icons in statusbar. Customise their elements and position
Customise battery elements in statusbar and also customise the batterybar
Enable or disable icons of your choice in statusbar
Customise the ticker style in statusbar
Enable or disable temperature in statusbar and customise its style
Enable or disable network traffic monitor in statusbar and customise its style, activity threshold and readings
Enable or disable carrier label in statusbar and customise its style
Enable or disable gestures used on statusbar
Give a breathing effect to notifications such as sms, missed call and voice mail
Customise various elements in notification drawer such as transparency and stroke
Customise various elements in volume dialog
Customise the dim and transparency of the power menu interface
Customise the various elements in recents panel such as slim recents.
Replace native clear all button with original floating action button and customise its position
Choose system accent & gradient colors of your choice. No more limits
Enable or disable animations when tapping qs tiles and customise them
Simpler than Styles & wallpapers. Customise colors, icons and various layouts of system
Choose various gestures acquired on screen
Enable, disable and customise various elements provided on lockscreen
Customise the bottom left and right shortcuts to your choice on lockscreen
Customise the weather layout on lockscreen. Ensure to set system gradient color to make all weather background options visible.
Customise the weather items on statusbar
Enable or disable various security features provided for lockscreen
Draw your gestures to launch preferred activity
Use a side bar to store your apps and activities that can be launched quickly with ease
Use a circular sidebar to store your quick apps and activities
Swipe from the edge to enable/disable a pie that consists of cool shortcuts and navigation controls
Customise the animations of each window in system
Enable or disable animations in power menu and also choose from a list of animations
Customise various toast popup animations and icons
View various ambient display options and customise its components
Choose to enable or disable heads up notifications and also set up their timeouts
Customise various options for system weather settings
Check for OTA updates and other links
Customise the look of your notifications in notification panel
Customise various options for the fingerpint sensor
Customise various elements on notification panel
Customise the density of the screen to scale screen to its absolute limit
This option will only work with the 3 button classic navbar or hardware keys (if available). Please enable navbar from navigation settings and come back here.
Looks like you have edge gestures navbar enabled.Consider using recents action in edge long swipe gesture to use this feature.
This option will only work with the navbar. Please enable navbar from navigation settings and come back here.
Looks like you have 2 button navbar enabled.Consider using recents action in home or back button double tap or long press to use this feature. Swiping up will trigger regular recents.
Looks like you have edge gesture navbar enabled.Slim recents can only be used with long swipe gestures.Swiping up will trigger regular recents.
Looks like you have 2 button navbar enabled.Slim recents can only be used with double tap or longpress actions for home or back button. Swiping up will trigger regular recents.
Looks like you have have no navigating options enabled. You need to enable atleast one of the system navigations to enable this option.
Discover different miscellaneous parts in the system
Show album artwork of current track or wallpaper on lockscreen
Toggle to make notifications shown on lockscreen semi-transparent. This may not work on dark themes

Brightness of always on or ambient display will always be less than the screen brighness. So if your brightness is low you cannot force AOD or Ambient display to go higher than that. They can only go lower than or equal to current brightness. To get brightness values higher, turn the force doze brightness switch on
Customise various elements of the statusbar
Customise various elements of the system
Customise various hardware buttons on your device like home, back, and menu
Unlock device with fingerprint after reboot without PIN/Password/Pattern\nNote: at your own risk!
Unlock device with fingerprint after reboot without PIN/Password/Pattern\nNote: You are encrypted so you can\'t use this feature.
Choose how to display the clock in the status bar
Choose how to display the clock & date in the status bar
Hide and display clock for regular interval to save statusbar space
Number of seconds to hide clock
Number of seconds to wait before hiding clock
Display clock in quick status bar header
Customise miscellaneous contents of the system interface
This visibility configuration also applies to the ambient display
Condition icon pack is used in quick settings and lock screen
When ambient display pulses, toggle to show hide weather display on ambient display
Show temp with scale and image
Show temp with image without scale
Choose wether to enable or disable weather service
Enable notification panel header weather display
Note: Some weather icons cannot be colored
Note\u003a you can install new icon packs from play store by searching for \"Chronus icons\"
Edit the navigation bar layout and buttons

Set to empty for default Resurrection Remix

Condition icon is hidden on Lockscreen
To configure and use system profiles, turn profiles on.
Set your own LCD density value
Press on color below to apply
Auto / Automatically raises the refresh rate from 60 to 90Hz for some content
Auto / Automatically raises the refresh rate from 60 to 120Hz for some content
60Hz / Refresh rate locked at 60Hz for all content
90Hz / Refresh rate locked at 90Hz for all content. Increased battery usage
120Hz / Refresh rate locked at 120Hz for all content. Increased battery usage
Battery history stats are going to be reset
Screenshot shutter sound enabled or disabled
Swipe fingerprint left or right to dismiss notifications
To dismiss your notifications, swipe left or right on the fingerprint sensor on the back of your phone.
Long press the volume rocker to skip tracks when playing music, even remotely on tv or PC with e.g. Spotify (app must run on the phone and show the notification).

Quickly disable heads up for all apps but keep them enabled for dialer and messaging apps
Disable heads-up notifications in these applications
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Play sound and vibration for notifications when screen is on
Enabled! Vibrations during battery saver will be active.
Disabled! Enable battery saver and reboot for changes to take effect. Do not forget to turn battery saver on before reboot.
Display negotiated charger max current-voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Color range used on dark status bar
Color range used on light status bar

Charging color used on light status bar

This will hide all force close notificaitons
This will hide all smart replies in notifications that support it
Tap here to add to the list, tap on the listed app to remove

Tap here to add, tap on the listed app to remove
Show 4G instead of LTE signal icon
Bug reporting is disabled in development settings
Select what to show when you press the power button
When restarting also show options for recovery and bootloader
Choose which side to display the logo on, left or right
Tint logo to accent color. This might cause visibility problems on dark or light statusbars.
Ensure to set system gradient color to make all search bar styles visible.
Please enable dark theme to set different themes
Add On-The-Go toggle to Power Menu
Hide the entire statusbar on lock screen
Once authenticated, an app stays unlocked until the screen turns off
Once authenticated, an app stays unlocked for 15 seconds after exiting
You can show/hide the notification content on a per-app basis by clicking on the notification icon shown on each locked apps\' preference
This feature is not available because this app is locked

Allows unlocking the device when screen is off when touching fingerprint sensor area. Screen wakes up upon authenticating. NOTE: this is an experimental feature. Oneplus devices do not have screen off FOD support but this is made to work in a different way. Sometimes it may not authenticate since burn-in protection timer makes pixels shift
Show ambient display for Screen off FOD
Enabled!When Screen off FOD is being used, screen will show ambient display when fingerprint area is touched. It is recommended to keep this switch off for more accuracy.
Disabled!When Screen off FOD is being used, device will wake when fingerprint area is being touched. It is recommended to keep this switch off for more accuracy.
Try out features that are still a work in progress for FOD
These features especially screen off features are HIGHLY EXPERIMENTAL! Please avoid reporting issues on them.
FOD Animation is disabled. Please enable to use.
Display the app icon corresponding with the toast
Resetting toast color will set to default system color of toast
Use default statusbar height in Hide
Display cutout disabled. Enable overlay from development settings then come back here
Force apps to ignore notch space
Clear recents by long-pressing the memory bar
Apply a custom icon pack for apps in the panel
Show RR logo for empty view

Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Toggle to enable setting max notifications count on lockscreen

Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
You are about to change layout to tabs (nougat) which was present in previous versions of RR-OS and is the default one. Are you sure you want to continue?
You are about to change layout to classic (marshmallow) which was present in previous versions of RR-OS. Are you sure you want to continue?
You are about to change layout to bottom navigation layout (oreo) which is a brand new layout in RR-OS tools. It might be a little different that the usual layout. Are you sure you want to continue?

Customise your plugged in charging sounds

Whether to show traffic measurement units

Duration after which speed is remeasured
In order to add your own icon, select the top left icon and use the OnePlus 6T FP Customiser app to select the icon you want.
Use wallpaper color for FOD icon
Uses adjusted primary wallpaper color for FOD icon\nNOTE: might look good only with some wallpapers
Customise Gaming mode preferences and game drivers
Automatically turn on for these apps
Gaming mode will turn on automatically when these apps are opened and turn off when they are closed
When Gaming mode is turned on, buttons will be locked
Lock screen brightness when Gaming mode is turned on
Optimize refresh rate when switching to gaming mode. 60hz is used preferably for a smoother gameplay
Try detecting and adding gaming apps automatically
Allow animation on on app authentication

Shows animation on some authentication screens. Keep in mind some apps may not unlock with this enabled. If you have issues unlocking apps with fingerprint, disable this option. This will not work on some apps as those apps use secure overlays to block any extra views.
Shows animation while reading your finger. This will not work on AOD. It will only work on pulsing notifications/ambient display

Keep the fingerprint on display icon bright at all times even on low brightness. This will increase fingerprint read performance but may consume sligtly more battery.Keeping this setting off will make the icon adapt screen brightness.
Block notifications sound & vibration when Gaming mode is turned on and game is running
Icons/colors may vary depending on which device you are using.
Disable night light when showing FOD

Disable night light when fingerprint is active. This is necessary for some devices that need correct colors for reading fingerprint. Disabling this might cause unreadable fingerprint on night light enabled. If this is enabled, everytime you are on auto night and you decide to disable it, FOD will re-enable night light on hiding
Hide the small divider in quick settings panel
Show the expand indicator arrow on dual target qs tiles
Select an image to use for static mode
Enable or disable custom images from image packs in quick settings header.
For better visibility on bright images
Click on any image to use for static mode
Toggle to make notification header transparent instead of black
Hide the darkish gradient behind the qs panel under the header. You will notice this over the edges of quick tiles bar
Select image from storage. Currently using original resolution
Select image from storage. Currently fitting to settings header
Tinting inactive tile is incompatible with this tile style. Please head to Resurrection themes and change qs tile style

Show gradient background on qs tiles instead of regular color. Note: in case of rgb tile tint or random tint, background will not tint to rgb colors only icons will tint if you turn on the above switch. This will not work wih custom tiles.
Please set gradient color different to system accent color to use this feature
Use system default Qs shape from resurrection themes to use this feature
Can only be used on default values. Turn on default switch below
Disabled because only applies to non-rgb or accent tints. Use only for primary default tint
This style is enabled by default on current qs shape and cannot be changed

All volume panel customisations only work with stock volume panel and hence settings that don\'t work will be rendered invisible. Please wait for volume panel to change setting. It takes about 3-4 seconds to change a panel so do not worry. Until the time a new volume panel is created, the stock one will appear. If things don\'t go as expected please change styles again, it will work.
Choose from various styles of volume panels. This will disable default system volume panel settings
Customise the animations of each window in system
Tint the icon inside to random rgb tint

Use custom background filter in empty space behind notification panel

Vibrate when pulling down quick settings or notification panel. It will vibrate once per cycle.

vibration pattern, vibration intensity, incall, haptics, tap, vibration strength

Enable to show visualiser on ambient display as well
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered. WARNING: DO NOT use a PIN more than 5 digits if you want to use this.
Show assistant handles on screen edges
Light up the side edges of the screen on notification pulse
Sets edge light color to the primary color of wallpaper
Enable for reverse repeat direction, disable for restart
Pulse for all activity such as when using tap to wake from ambient display

The time and count settings will only work for a maximum of 10 seconds if using Ambient Display. If AOD for edge lighting is active, use 0 for repeat count as that will make it pulse infinitely till screen is awake. Example: change AOD to charge only and let it animate while charging on AOD
Toggle to show edge lighting on AOD as well. This setting might consume more battery
Hide AOD elements when notification pulses
Show /hide AOD content like clock, weather and battery info when edge light appears for notification
Show edge lighting on always on display only when charging
Swipe up on the lockscreen to use face unlock
Portion of screen height used as touchable region for back gesture.
Show an animated arrow for back gesture.
Force show/ hide navbar when needed
SystemUI will be restarted so that selected setting can be applied correctly.
SystemUI MIGHT need to be restarted in order to avoid issues when changing volume panel styles. Would you like to continue? You can choose to press cancel but this is just a precaution.
Enable haptic tick effect on back gesture
Disable height of virtual keyboard as touchable region for back gesture
Enable to show keyboard buttons when virtual keyboard is active
Whether to show R style notification headers (Requires a SystemUI restart)
Whether to position R style notification headers at the center

Smart pixels is a power saving feature. Depending on how many pixels you decide to turn off, you could see improvement in battery life. Please note that turning on smartpixels could affect fingerprint scanner peformance. This applies to only in display-fingerprint scanners as pixels on the screen keep shifting.
Save battery by shutting off extra pixels
Shut off pixels to reduce power consumption
Enable Smart Pixels when battery saver is enabled
Prevents burn-in on OLED devices by shifting pixels every so often
\n\nThe schedule from sunset to sunrise requires enabled location services to get the correct times for your location.
Focus ringtone on different audio components of the device
Headset only if music is active
Allow accessing quick settings on secure lockscreen
Replace clear all text with a new button
Show clear all notifications button in quick settings instead of default text one

Simply tap on the preference above and use the color picker to choose whichever color you want as your system accent. You can also manually insert hex values into color picker. No more limitations to colors.
Display volume panel on the left side of the screen
Show ringer button on top of volume panel
Show music card in volume panel when music is active. This is only meant for music players and not for apps like youtube
Display notification when changing alert slider position
Display lock icon on the lockscreen
Actions will be executed on screen off. On screen on the previous state will be restored.
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off. NOTE: Some operators have deprecated 2G mode. If they do not support it, you will have no data active till you switch this off.
Network mode will be switched to 3G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off
Mobile data will be disabled on screen off
Number of seconds to wait before performing actions after screen off
Number of seconds to wait before performing actions after screen on
Display battery status for the connected bluetooth device, if available
Display estimated remaining battery life when available
Merge signal and signal type icons to make data indicators look like classic ones
Keep screen awake with Always on Display feature while device is charging
Use custom brightness values instead of screen brightness
Your screen brightness will automatically adjust to your environment and activities.\n\nYou can adjust a minimal brightness level that will be used.
Display weather next to date instead big widget. This mode is forced on some custom clocks
Whether to use Dual Channel mode for SBC codec by default
Random for dark theme, RGB for light theme
Random for light theme, RGB for dark theme
Qs labels are disabled. Scroll above and enable tiles titles.
Tint the label of inactive tile titles as well
Tint the background of inactive tile titles as well
Show notification count near notfication icons
Pulse does not work with some audio sources when listening on device speaker
Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar area, also if bar is hidden
Audio graphic equalizer on the lockscreen
Each bar is animated more smoothly
Active! Pulse will show on all sound events after a stream starts, provided volume is not muted. Sometimes lock and unlock may be required to trigger. This is an experimental feature.
Active! Pulse will show on all sound events after a stream starts on navbar only, provided volume is not muted. Sometimes lock and unlock may be required to trigger. This is an experimental feature.
Active! Pulse will show on all sound events after a stream starts on lockscreen, provided volume is not muted. Sometimes lock and unlock may be required to trigger. This is an experimental feature.
Inactive! Visualizer will only show up on music.
Inactive! Visualizer will only show up on music on lockscreen.
Will give your sms notifications a breathing effect in the status bar. Only works on AOSP messenger.
Will give your missed call notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar. Only works with AOSP dialer
Will give your voicemail notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Display running services icon in QS footer
Enable settings icon in the footer
Show/hide entire clock & date view on lockscreen
Are you sure you want to reset these colors to default?
It seems you have Divided lines clock enabled and hence pixel style weather cannot be used.
It seems you have MNML\'s Box clock enabled and hence pixel style weather cannot be used

Pixel style weather is enabled. Please disable to customise weather colors. Also pixel style weather is aligned with lockscreen date. To customise weather bg, alignment & color consider heading back to lockscreen settings to align date and use lockdate colors to customise colors.
Ensure to set system gradient color to make all date background options visible.
Choose and customise battery options on lockscreen such as charging style

Lockscreen date is disabled. Weather will be forced to non-pixel style. Go back and enable lockscreen date to use this setting. Ensure to set system gradient color to make all weather background options visible.
Monitor the battery health of your device
The current battery capacity measured by the kernel
The battery capacity designed by the manufacturer
Settings needs to rebuild UI in order to apply this setting. Would you like to continue?
RR tools needs to rebuild UI in order to apply this setting. You will be taken back to RR tools homepage. Would you like to continue?
RR tools needs to rebuild UI in order to apply this setting. Would you like to continue?
Enables Custom filter when powermenu is active
Change the default font of the lockscreen date widget
Change the default font of the lockscreen weather temp
Change the default font of the lockscreen weather city
Change the default font of the lockscreen owner info
Customise various fonts and colors of lockscreen clock
Change the default font of the lockscreen clock widget
Show spacer above settings dashboard for easier use with one hand
Toggle to show profile avatar , rr logo or custom image
Toggle to hide profile avatar from search bar
Match settings fragment search bar color
Force the search bar inside different settings fragments in Settings app to be same color as dashboard
Set an avatar first from user settings.
Fit to settings header (wide image recommended)
Current app is not supported. Please use another gallery app to set image
Show animation on longpress navbar home button
Always keep notifications expanded. Warning! This feature has known to cause some performance regression in notification panel. Use at your own risk
It looks like you have disabled Qs background gradient from header settings. Go to header settings and disable this feature and come back here.
These are power saving features. They may interfere with services intended to run at idle, like navigation apps. You can whitelist these apps from being affected in the app battery settings.
Enter device idle more frequently and wake up less
Restrict apps from running the background
Enable Aggressive Battery automatically when using battery saver
Block access to certain sensors for some apps to save battery.

This is the time, after becoming inactive, at which we start looking at the motion sensor to determine if the device is being left alone. We don\'t do this immediately after going inactive just because we don\'t want to be continually running the significant motion sensor whenever the screen is off

If we don\'t receive a callback from AnyMotion in this amount of time + locating_to, we will change from STATE_SENSING to STATE_INACTIVE, and any AnyMotion callbacks while not in STATE_SENSING will be ignored
This is how long we will wait to try to get a good location fix before going in to idle mode
The desired maximum accuracy (in meters) we consider the location to be good enough to go on to idle. We will be trying to get an accuracy fix at least this good or until locating_to expires
This is the time, after seeing motion, that we wait after becoming inactive from that until we start looking for motion again
This is the time, after the inactive timeout elapses, that we will wait looking for significant motion until we truly consider the device to be idle
This is the initial time, after being idle, that we will allow ourself to be back in the IDLE_PENDING state allowing the system to run normally until we return to idle
Maximum pending idle timeout (time spent running) we will be allowed to use
Scaling factor to apply to current pending idle timeout each time we cycle through that state
This is the initial time that we want to sit in the idle state before waking up again to return to pending idle and allowing normal work to run
Maximum idle duration we will be allowed to use
Scaling factor to apply to current idle timeout each time we cycle through that state
This is the minimum time we will allow until the next upcoming alarm for us to actually go in to idle mode
Max amount of time to temporarily whitelist an app when it receives a high tickle
Amount of time we would like to whitelist an app that is receiving an MMS
Amount of time we would like to whitelist an app that is receiving an SMS
This is the time, after becoming inactive, that we go in to the first light-weight idle mode
This is amount of time we will wait from the point where we decide we would like to go idle until we actually do, while waiting for jobs and other current activity to finish
This is the initial time that we will run in idle maintenance mode
Scaling factor to apply to the light idle mode time each time we complete a cycle
This is the maximum time we will run in idle maintenence mode
This is the minimum amount of time we want to make available for maintenance mode when lightly idling
This is the maximum amount of time we want to make available for maintenance mode when lightly idling
This is the minimum amount of time that we will stay in maintenance mode after a light doze
This is the minimum amount of time that we will stay in maintenance mode after a full doze
Amount of time we would like to whitelist an app that is handling a notification
Maintenance mode light idle min timeout
Maintenance mode light idle max timeout
Maintenance mode light doze min timeout
Maintenance mode full doze min timeout
No kernel wakelock stats file /proc/wakelocks or /sys/kernel/debug/wakeup_sources found.
Press reset to start collecting time in state data
Press reset to start collecting wakelock data
Please unplug power to get wakelock data
No states file found. Are you sure your phone is compatible?\n\nIf you are running a custom ROM or kernel, try contacting its developer to inform him that the states file is not readable.

Show left & right arrows to control the cursor while typing

To choose a specific app activity for the action, long press on any app in the app picker

End the current call by pressing the power button
Press volume keys to answer calls

IME space is disabled. Enable it to use this setting.
Change the enter/exit animation of the power menu
Use inverted layout for navbar buttons

Allow legacy apps to use full screen
Applications need to be restarted after changes
Prevent interaction with the hardware buttons while the screen is being used
Long-press the volume keys to seek music tracks when the screen is off
Press volume keys to wake your device
Significant motion, accelerometer, linear acceleration sensors will be blocked for these apps
Display a brief animation when the device is plugged in
Display VoWiFi icon when available. Enabled by default from status bar tuner
Display Multi-user switcher icon in quick settings footer
Display the tile edit icon in quick settings footer
Show brightness buttons on the side of brightness slider
Hide auto brightness icon in QS footer
Enable or disable settings panel on longpressing dual targer QS tiles
Hide drag handle in QS panel footer
Show/hide security footer message when VPN is active in footer text
Blur custom image.Note: blur may not work on some images
Privacy indicators disabled. Toggle to display privacy indicators like camera & microphone in statusbar when being used.
Privacy indicators enabled in status bar, if you wish to disable camera or microphone individually, head back to status bar tuner and un-check them.
Show privacy indicator in QS header
Display privacy indicators like camera & microphone in QS header when being used.
Reduces eye strain in low light conditions but may result in reduced image quality and poor color production.
Turn on when brightness is below the threshold
Only activate DC Dimming when the average brightness is below the threshold
Choose from various shapes for adaptive icons. These apply to apps, launchers, settings dashboard and quick settings (if no custom quick setting tiles are enabled)
Choose from various statusbar icon shapes. These apply to icons in the status bar only like wifi, signal, bluetooth, battery and so on
Choose from various SystemUI icon shapes. These apply to icons related to volume panel and small other SystemUI elements like sound related icons
Choose from various Settings icon shapes. These apply to icons related to Settings dashboard icons. These icons do not affect RR tools

Choose from a large option of themes. Be sure to restart settings to avoid glitches when applying clear themes. Be sure to restart SystemUI if you run into issues or system slowdowns after applying many themes.
